    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1866</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jews in Arab/Islamic Countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Juden in den Arab/Islamic Ländern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Juifs dans des pays d'Arab/Islamic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jews em países de Arab/Islamic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ebrei in paesi arabi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εβραίοι στις αραβικές/ισλαμικές χώρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Judíos en países de Arab/Islamic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis is a Resource which presents information about theJewish populations in Arab/islamic countries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">arab countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">muslim countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish population</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Hilfsmittel, das Informationen 
über theJewish Bevölkerungen in den Arab/islamic Ländern darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci est une ressource qui présente des 
informations sur des populations de theJewish dans des pays 
d'Arab/islamic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um recurso que apresente a informação 
sobre populações do theJewish em países de Arab/islamic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una risorsa che presenta le informazioni 
sulle popolazioni del theJewish in paesi arabi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το THis είναι ένα στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που 
παρουσιάζει τις πληροφορίες για τους πληθυσμούς theJewish στις 
αραβικές/ισλαμικές χώρες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un recurso que presenta la información 
sobre poblaciones del theJewish en países de Arab/islamic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">arabische Länder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">moslemische Länder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdische Bevölkerung</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays arabes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays musulmans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Population juive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">países árabes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">países muçulmanos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">População jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paesi arabi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paesi musulmani</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Popolazione ebrea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αραβικές χώρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
